definition: to become naturalized/to become a citizen
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
book or record/registry/roll/place of one's family or ancestral records/membership

sentences.english: Will travel overseas affect eligibility under the new requirements?
sentences.chinese: 根据新的要求，海外旅行是否会影响入籍资格？

sentences.english: A further five cruises will use Shanghai as a home port in the next five years.
sentences.chinese: 在未来五年时间里，又将有五艘油轮入籍上海港。

definition: permanent resident/person with the right to live in a country or territory
permanent residency permit (originally referred specifically to the US green card)
(Tw) to be in the care of one's relatives/to be dependent on a relative/to draw on family connections
population (counted as number of households for census or taxation)/registered residence/residence permit/(in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
to escort a criminal under guard (in former times)
